name: initiate_swap
description: Swaps one token for another using Uniswap on Base. Call this when the user wants to swap, trade, or exchange tokens. The user must have a connected wallet. This triggers wallet popups for approval and signing.

parameters.description: Parameters for initiating a token swap

amount.description: The amount of tokenIn to swap (e.g. '10' for 10 USDC)
